pythagoras.f
Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.f.RectangularShape
      pythagoras.f.AbstractRectangle
          pythagoras.f.Rectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, IRectangle, IRectangularShape, IShape
public class Rectangle
extends AbstractRectangle
implements Serializable

Represents an area in two dimensions.

See Also:
Serialized Form

grow

public void grow(float dx,
                 float dy)
Grows the bounds of this rectangle by the specified amount (i.e. the upper-left corner moves by the specified amount in the negative x and y direction and the width and height grow by twice the specified amount).
